
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
# fix ue -> ü in data
mastertable <- readr::read_csv("data/geo/mastertable_vorw_bdl.csv")

mastertable <- mastertable |> 
    dplyr::mutate(Bundesland = str_replace_all(Bundesland, "ue", "ü"))
mastertable |> readr::write_csv("data/geo/mastertable_vorw_bdl.csv")

# in old data
all_files <- fs::dir_ls('data/raw/annual') 
for (f in all_files) {
    df <- readr::read_csv(f)
    df <- df |>
        dplyr::mutate(Bundesland = str_replace_all(Bundesland, "ue", "ü")) |> 
        readr::write_csv(f)
}
```
